title: emit authentication error
description: This event is emmited when the auth token provided by user cannot be verified
name: AuthError

title: broadcast users online
description: This broadcast event is emited to indicate the online users
name: AuthError

title: send friend request
description: This event is emited when one client sends a request to another(this is for notification purpose only)
name: Friendrequest

title: emit
description: This event is emited when a notification of update arrives from client
name: Noti

description: This event is emited to save the notification received to database
name: SaveNotification

title: verify user
description: This event is emited to ask client to verify itself.
name: Verifyuser

title: to disconnect from socket
description: This eventListner is listens to disconnect event to disconnect from socket
name: Disconnect

title: friends related notification
description: This eventListner listens to updates from client on friend request,reject,accept,unfriend
name: FriendNotification

title: notification
description: This eventListner listens to updates from client
name: NotifyUpdates

title: save notification to database
description: This eventListner listens to notification updates to save them in database

title: Setting user online

name: SetUser
